      FormContainer WidgetProvider.buildFormView(int index)
      build a view containing all widgets according to the json archetype structure, layout and ontology, All widgets are rendered in a vertical layout, optionally ordered by section and/or item priority (if specified in the layout json schema) (This method first calls the WidgetProvider.buildSectionWidgets(String[]) methods on all archetype sections (or on the sections provided by the layout schema , if provided).
      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.List<DatatypeWidget<EhrDatatype>>> WidgetProvider.buildSectionWidgets(java.lang.String[] sections)
      Builds a Map of widgets, according to the provided archetype json schema, where each key is an archetype section and the corresponding values are an oredered list of widgets corresponding to the underluying EHR datatypes.

      Builds a list of widgets from a specific section and item index.
